paper_abstract: In this paper, we propose a test of fit based on maximum entropy. The asymptotic distribution of the proposed test statistic is established and a corrected form for small and medium sample sizes is furnished. The performance of the test is investigated through extensive Monte Carlo simulations. Real examples are also presented and analyzed. (C) 2011 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A maximum entropy type test of fit
